SELECT bcIdx, cbIdx, title,
REGEXP_REPLACE(content, '<[^>]*>|\&([^;])*;','') AS content,
dept, regDt FROM (SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT BC_IDX AS bcIdx, CB_IDX AS cbIdx, SUB_CONT AS title, CLOB_CONT AS content, NAME_CONT AS dept, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS regDt FROM EZ_BBS_CONTENT WHERE CB_IDX = 60 AND BC_DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY REG_DT DESC ) A) B ORDER BY regDt DESC LIMIT #{pLimit} OFFSET 0
